title: Marvel Comics: Wolverine collection
description:
A collection of Wolverine comic books, featuring 3 full volumes of the main series up to Wolverine vol.3 #69, plus:

* Annuals

1995
1996
1997
1999
2000
2001
2007

* Crossovers

Blade #5
Darkness - Wolverine
Spiderman vs Wolverine - High Tide
Witchblade - Wolverine

* Mini-series

1984 - Kitty Pryde and Wolverine
1988 - Havok & Wolverine - Meltdown
1989 - Wolverine Saga
1991 - Weapon X
1993 - Wolverine & The Punisher - Damaging Evidence
1994 - Wolverine & Punisher - Revelation
1995 - Wolverine And Gambit - Victims
1996 - Deathblow & Wolverine
1996 - Venom vs Wolverine - Tooth and Claw
1998 - Wolverine - Days of Future Past
1999 - Wild Thing - Daughter of Wolverine
2000 - Iron Fist & Wolverine - The Return Of K'un Lun
2002 - Origin
2002 - Elektra & Wolverine - Redeemer
2002 - Marvel Knights - Wolverine & Hulk
2002 - Wolverine - Netsuke
2003 - Hulk & Wolverine - 6 Hours
2003 - Marvel Knights - Spider-Man & Wolverine
2003 - Wolverine - Snikt!
2003 - Wolverine & Doop
2003 - Wolverine Xisle
2004 - Wolverine The End
2004 - Marvel Knights - Wolverine & Punisher
2004 - Wolverine - Captain America
2005 - Soultaker
2006 - Claws (Black Cat & Wolverine )
2008 - Logan
2008 - Original Sin

2005 - X-23 Innocence lost
2007 - X-23 Target X

Up to #30
